attributes.action: Boycott American companies until US ends inhumane treatment of refugee children
attributes.background: The US is separating and punishing families: forcing children into caged camps, torturing parents by taking their children, and violating the  human rights of refugees, asylum seekers and migrants into America. Please help stop - hit them where it hurts - boycott US trade and companies and tourism.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it sounds like you are calling for people to take action rather than the UK Government or Parliament.

You might like to sign these petitions instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/266065

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/265495
